meanings.definition: To lie or be situated under something
meanings.sent2: The roots of the tree underlies the ground.
meanings.sent3: The treasure map underlies the old oak tree.
meanings.sent5: The river underlies the bridge, unseen but supporting it.

meanings.definition: To be the basis or foundation of something
meanings.sent4: Love underlies a strong family bond.
meanings.sent5: Patience underlies personal growth, like roots supporting a tree.

meanings.definition: To be hidden or not immediately apparent
meanings.sent1: His true intentions underlies his charming smile.
meanings.sent2: The complexity of the issue underlies the surface simplicity.
meanings.sent3: The magic trick underlies a clever sleight of hand.
meanings.sent4: The underlying message underlies the entire story.
meanings.sent5: The undercurrent of tension underlies their polite conversation.
